name: The Alchemist (itch) (TurkiKAlqou)
description:
Deep within the confines of a long-forgotten dungeon lies the key to untold power - the elusive "Ancient Potion". Armed only with their wits and the tools of their trade, our intrepid alchemist sets out on a perilous quest to uncover the secrets of the dungeon and claim the potion for themselves. But the path ahead is treacherous and full of danger, with ancient traps, fierce guardians, and twisted mysteries lurking around every corner.

Will our alchemist succeed where others have failed, or will they become just another victim of the dungeon's malevolent magic? The fate of the potion - and the alchemist - rests in your hands.
